title: Underground Resistance Bunker Adventure #93
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Sleeping Quarters
rooms.description: A cramped underground room with metal bunk beds bolted to concrete walls. Dim emergency lights cast long shadows. The air is stale and cool. Personal belongings are scattered on footlockers, and resistance propaganda posters cover the walls. A heavy steel door leads north.

items.name: metal footlocker
items.description: A dented footlocker with two compartments and a resistance symbol painted on the lid

items.name: resistance fighter's journal
items.description: A worn notebook with handwritten entries
items.text: Day 47: The regime fell in 1984, the year we'll never forget. Commander Sarah leads us now. We store weapons in the arsenal. Our mission: reach the surface through the escape tunnel. The supply room code is hidden in the operations manual.

items.name: security access card
items.description: A plastic card with a magnetic strip labeled 'Level 2 Access'

items.name: metal bunk bed
items.description: A sturdy bunk bed with thin mattresses

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A key hidden between the mattresses, slightly tarnished

items.name: resistance posters
items.description: Posters showing resistance slogans and symbols
items.text: RESIST! REMEMBER 1984! FREEDOM OR DEATH! Commander Sarah leads the way!

items.name: reinforced steel door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader mounted beside it

rooms.name: Command Center
rooms.description: The nerve center of the resistance bunker. Radio equipment lines one wall, crackling with static. A large tactical map covers another wall, marked with positions and routes. Computer monitors flicker with encrypted data. Filing cabinets and a command desk dominate the room. Doors lead east and west.

items.name: tactical wall map
items.description: A detailed map showing bunker layout and surface escape routes
items.text: Map shows: Sleeping Quarters (South), Command Center (Center), Supply Room (East), Arsenal (West), Escape Tunnel (North from Supply Room). Red X marks the escape tunnel exit to freedom.

items.name: commander's desk
items.description: A metal desk covered with papers and communication equipment

items.name: operations manual
items.description: A tactical handbook with resistance protocols
items.text: RESISTANCE OPERATIONS MANUAL - Supply Room Access Code: Enter the three numbers representing our core values. Freedom (7 letters), Unity (5 letters), Victory (7 letters). Code: 757

items.name: commander's personal note
items.description: A handwritten note from Commander Sarah
items.text: To whoever finds this: I am Commander Sarah, leader of this cell. Our weapons are stored in the arsenal to the west. The escape tunnel requires knowledge of our mission. Remember: we fight for freedom, we hide in bunkers, and I lead this resistance.

items.name: secure filing cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet with classified documents

items.name: arsenal access key
items.description: A heavy key labeled 'Arsenal - Authorized Personnel Only'

items.name: intelligence report
items.description: A classified document with enemy movements
items.text: CLASSIFIED: Enemy patrols have increased. We must evacuate through the northern escape tunnel soon. All personnel should memorize the security questions. Our cause is freedom, our sanctuary is this bunker, our leader is Commander Sarah.

items.name: radio communications array
items.description: Sophisticated radio equipment for encrypted communications

items.name: arsenal door
items.description: A reinforced door leading west to the weapons storage

items.name: supply room door
items.description: A standard door leading east to the supply room

rooms.name: Arsenal
rooms.description: A secure weapons storage room with racks of rifles, ammunition crates, and tactical gear. The walls are reinforced concrete. Everything is organized with military precision. A workbench holds maintenance tools and equipment.

items.name: weapon storage racks
items.description: Metal racks holding various resistance weapons

items.name: heavy bolt cutters
items.description: Large bolt cutters capable of cutting through chains and locks

items.name: ammunition crate
items.description: A wooden crate filled with ammunition and supplies

items.name: supply manifest
items.description: A document listing all weapons and equipment
items.text: ARSENAL INVENTORY: 47 rifles, 23 pistols, 156 grenades, bolt cutters (for emergency use), tactical gear. Note: Bolt cutters can cut through the chain on the escape tunnel hatch.

items.name: maintenance workbench
items.description: A sturdy workbench with tools and weapon parts

rooms.name: Supply Room
rooms.description: A storage area packed with crates of food, water, medical supplies, and equipment. Shelves line the walls from floor to ceiling. The room smells of cardboard and preserved rations. A ladder leads up to a hatch in the ceiling, secured with a heavy chain. A security terminal guards access to the escape route.

items.name: stacked supply crates
items.description: Wooden crates containing food and water rations

items.name: first aid kit
items.description: A red medical kit with basic supplies

items.name: metal storage shelves
items.description: Industrial shelving units holding various supplies

items.name: evacuation plan document
items.description: A laminated document with escape procedures
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of emergency, proceed to supply room. Access escape tunnel via ceiling hatch (chain must be cut). Security terminal requires verification: What do we fight for? Where do we hide? Who leads us?

items.name: ceiling hatch with chain
items.description: A metal hatch in the ceiling secured with a thick chain and padlock

rooms.name: Escape Tunnel Entrance
rooms.description: A narrow concrete passage leading upward. Emergency lights illuminate a steep tunnel carved through rock and earth. A security door blocks the way forward, its electronic lock glowing red. This is the final barrier between you and freedom.

items.name: security verification terminal
items.description: An electronic terminal with a screen displaying three security questions

password_questions.question: What do we fight for?
password_questions.hint: Check the operations manual and intelligence reports

password_questions.question: Where do we hide?
password_questions.hint: The intelligence report mentions our sanctuary

password_questions.question: Who leads us?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the resistance leader's name

items.name: emergency lighting
items.description: Battery-powered lights showing the way to freedom

rooms.name: Surface Freedom
rooms.description: You emerge into the open air! Sunlight streams down as you climb out of the tunnel into a forest clearing. Birds sing in the trees. The bunker entrance is hidden behind you. You've successfully escaped the underground resistance bunker and can now continue the fight for freedom in the outside world.

items.name: forest clearing
items.description: A peaceful clearing surrounded by tall trees, far from enemy patrols

items.name: camouflaged tunnel entrance
items.description: The bunker entrance, cleverly hidden beneath brush and branches

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've navigated the resistance bunker, solved all the puzzles, and escaped to the surface! The resistance lives on, and you're free to continue the fight. Commander Sarah would be proud. You win!
